name: Chris Roman
description:
am funny and good looking. This may seem shallow, or mutually exclusive, but laughter and sex are the two best ways of easing tension and I don’t think a relationship can survive hard times without them.
Money is also a necessity for surviving hard times. I’m good with money and plan to do things like pay the bills, own a house, go on vacations and retire someday. If I acquire a partner he needs to pull his weight.
